text: Latvia national football team is the national football team of Latvia. They never qualified for the FIFA World Cup, but they did qualify for the UEFA Euro 2004. ==Most appearances== # Name Career Caps Goals 1\. Vitālijs Astafjevs 1992–2010 167 16 2\. Andrejs Rubins 1998–2011 117 10 3\. Juris Laizāns 1998–2013 113 15 4\. Imants Bleidelis 1995–2007 106 10 5\. Mihails Zemļinskis 1992–2005 105 12 6\. Māris Verpakovskis 1999–2014 104 29 7\.
